did.abstract: The collection contains a photo album of images from 1903 Ireland as well as a travel diary documenting the trip from the United States to Europe. Also included in the collection is a book belonging to the donor's great-grandmother, who lived during the time of Great Famine in Ireland. The book The Following of Christ by Thomas a Kempis, is inscribed with the owner's signature and "4p" most likely alluding to the cost of the book as four pence which indicates it could have been purchased in England.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Content Note
scopecontent.p: The collection consists of a personal family artifacts including a photo album, travel diary, and publication, The Following of Christ.

The photo album contains images of Ireland around 1903 Ireland, a companion piece to the travel diary which documents a trip made by Ms. Carmody from the United States to Europe in 1903. Also included in the collection is a book belonging to the donor's great-grandmother, who lived during the time of Great Famine in Ireland. The book The Following of Christ by Thomas a Kempis, is inscribed with the owner's signature and "4p" most likely alluding to the cost of the book as four pence which indicates it could have been purchased in England.
